extent.measure: Each leaf consists of recto and verso

supportDesc.foliation: 16 numbered pages, page numbering starts on 3r

layout.p: Most pages are laid out in two columns; running footers contain the page number.
Illustrations never occupy full pages, do not contain a title or caption.
Backmatter is printed inside a text box, includes advertisements for other publications; these are arranged in two columns, with a line separating each ad

decoDesc.p: Cover drawing by Alberto Martini. Two logos. One cover logo, one logo reading 'Poesia' and 'Rassegna Internazionale'. 3 decorated initials.

history.summary: Text in Italian, French, and English
